title: Telephone Number
description: A landline or mobile phone number, specified in international dialing format (e.g., +1 212 555 1212)

metadata.purpose: A phone number that can be used to contact a person or organization. The number should be provided in international dialing format (e.g., the US telephone number (212) 555-1212 should be formatted as +1 212 555 1212).
